text: The 2019 World Men's Curling Championship (branded as the 2019 Pioneer Hi-Bred World Men's Curling Championship for sponsorship reasons) was held from March 30 to April 7 at the ENMAX Centre in Lethbridge, Alberta, Canada. ==Qualification== The following nations are qualified to participate in the 2019 World Men's Curling Championship: * (host country) *One team from the 2018 Americas ChallengeAs the zone with the automatically qualifying host country, the Americas zone loses one guaranteed berth. ** *Seven teams from the 2018 European Curling ChampionshipsAs the zone with the lowest-placed team in the 2018 World Men's Curling Championship, the European zone loses one guaranteed berth. ** ** ** ** ** ** ** *Two teams from the 2018 Pacific-Asia Curling Championships ** ** *Two teams from the 2019 World Qualification Event ** ** ;Notes ==Teams== The teams are as follows: {| class=wikitable |- !width=200| !width=200| !width=200| !width=200| !width=200| |- |The Glencoe Club, Calgary Skip: Kevin Koe Third: B.J.
